name: Dimension Dash (itch) (Yichen Wang)
description:
// about this game

This is a game where you travel through dimensions (0D, 1D, 2D, 3D) while the dimensions slowly interacts with each other.

// download instructions

Download zip file to your respective platform and unzip and open it. If there is a problem opening the files, Google it!

// Mac download instructions

When you try to open the game, it would say unidentified developer, go to Security and Privacy in Setting and click the lock to then press open anyway on the game.

// controls

AD or Arrow Keys - move left / right

Space Bar - jump/shoot (in 3D or last stage)
